decks.notes: The main strategy of this deck is to control the game by using various removal spells and creature abilities to disrupt the opponent's board state. The deck also focuses on generating value through sacrificing creatures and drawing cards to maintain resources. The key concept revolves around attrition and resource management, using Golgari colors to efficiently handle threats and outlast the opponent until securing victory. The inclusion of specific cards like Crypt Rats and Defile further enhances the control aspect of the deck, while cards like Ichor Wellspring and Tithing Blade provide card advantage and flexibility in gameplay.

The deck focuses on controlling the game with a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and card draw. It aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while maintaining card advantage through efficient card draw and removal. The inclusion of creatures like Murmuring Mystic and Tolarian Terror provides a win condition and helps in pressuring the opponent while controlling the game. The deck also utilizes the snow mechanic for additional synergies with cards like Skred and Lórien Revealed. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent through its control elements and efficient card selection.

The main focus of the deck is to control the game by using removal spells like Cast Down and Defile, as well as creatures like Avenging Hunter and Troll of Khazad-dûm to maintain board presence. The deck also utilizes sacrifice effects with cards like Deadly Dispute and Crypt Rats to gain value and disrupt the opponent's strategy. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Thorn of the Black Rose to generate card advantage and maintain control over the game. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent in a resource-based battle.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures like Akroan Crusader, Kiln Fiend, and Satyr Hoplite. By using cheap pump spells like Apostle's Blessing, Brute Force, and Mutagenic Growth, as well as protection spells like Satyr Hoplite, the deck aims to deal large amounts of damage quickly. Immolating Souleater provides a versatile threat, while Ancestral Anger and Temur Battle Rage help finish off the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Simian Spirit Guide and Lotus Petal allows for explosive starts and powerful early game plays.

The main focus of this Gruul Aggro deck is to quickly ramp up mana using cards like Utopia Sprawl and Arbor Elf, then use that mana to play powerful creatures and spells to overwhelm the opponent. Cards like Avenging Hunter and Annoyed Altisaur provide aggressive threats, while spells like Malevolent Rumble and Mwonvuli Acid-Moss disrupt the opponent's game plan. With a mix of ramp, removal, and strong creatures, this deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early and maintain that pressure throughout the game.

This Aggro Red Deck Wins deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with early aggression and burn spells. The deck includes efficient creatures like Goblin Bushwhacker and Goblin Blast-Runner, alongside burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Blast to finish off the opponent. The goal is to deal damage as quickly as possible and close out the game before the opponent can establish a strong defense. With a low mana curve and an emphasis on direct damage, this deck aims to win through aggressive and relentless attacking.

The deck focuses on using sacrifice effects and card draw to set up a combo with Sadistic Glee, allowing for explosive plays and overwhelming your opponent with creatures buffed up with the enchantment. It also includes some removal and protection spells to control the board and protect your key pieces. The goal is to quickly build up a strong board presence and finish off your opponent before they can respond effectively.

This deck focuses on quickly building a wide board of small, efficient creatures in order to overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of attackers. By using cards like Thraben Inspector and Novice Investigator for card advantage, along with anthem effects like Guardians' Pledge and Lunarch Veteran to boost the power of the team, the goal is to go on the offensive early and maintain pressure throughout the game. With some resilience provided by Prismatic Strands and Recommission, this aggro weenie white deck aims to race opponents and secure victory through sheer numbers and relentless aggression.

The main goal of this deck is to assemble a combo using creatures with defender to generate a large amount of mana, then untapping these creatures with cards like Freed from the Real to produce an infinite mana loop. This mana can then be used to activate Valakut Invoker's ability multiple times to deal lethal damage to the opponent. The deck also utilizes Lead the Stampede and Winding Way to dig through the deck and find combo pieces quickly. The Walls Combo archetype aims to overwhelm the opponent with a powerful combo finish.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with quick, low-cost spells and creatures while maintaining control of the game through counterspells and bounce effects. By utilizing cards like Lórien Revealed and Tolarian Terror to generate card advantage and efficient threats like Delver of Secrets and Cryptic Serpent, the deck aims to apply pressure early in the game and disrupt the opponent's game plan through counter magic and tempo plays. The deck also includes card selection and draw spells like Thought Scour and Brainstorm to ensure consistency and maintain card advantage.

The deck focuses on using Sadistic Glee in combination with creatures like Basking Broodscale and Rubblebelt Maverick to create a powerful combo that can quickly overwhelm opponents. Malevolent Rumble and Thoughtpicker Witch provide additional support and disruption, while Evolution Witness and Unearth help to recycle key cards from the graveyard. Implement of Ferocity and Deadly Dispute offer additional ways to boost creature power, with Fanatical Offering providing a way to protect key creatures. Khalni Garden and Darkmoss Bridge provide additional resources, while the land base ensures a balanced mana distribution for consistent performance.
